[`Component`](../Component) › [`register`](./register)

## Component.register() method

Registers a callback to be called when unloading

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(cb: () => any): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter       | Type                      | Description |
| --------------- | ------------------------- | ----------- |
| <code>cb</code> | <code>() =&gt; any</code> |             |

**Returns:**

`void`
